I am currently a senior at University of California, Los Angeles (UCLA) majoring in Statistics & Data Science with a minor in Digital Humanities. As a Break Through Tech Fellow, I've honed my machine learning skills through Cornell's certification program while applying this knowledge to impactful projects. My research experience spans from developing AI chatbots for health applications at The Root Remedy to analyzing virtual reality user experiences at CSUF, reflecting my commitment to innovating at the intersection of AI and human-centered technology.
